title: Why voice assistants will never be good enough
description:
Check out iFixit for Black Friday & holiday discounts (sponsored): https://eustore.ifixit.com/collections/black-friday-deals?utm_source=Youtube&utm_medium=Video&utm_campaign=Techaltar

►►► This video ◄◄◄  

The Humane AI Pin, the Meta RayBan smart glasses & many other new products claim that voice assistants & voice-controlled computers are the future, potentially even replacing your smartphone. I think this is false. Voice is fundamentally not a great computer interface. 

The Story Behind

This video on Nebula: https://nebula.tv/videos/techaltar-why-voice-assistants-will-never-be-good-enough
